name: Echoes of Numa
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D RPG in the style of Midnight's Blessing and Valiant - Resurrection.

Many centuries ago, the Goddess Numa sacrificed her physical self so humankind could survive. Now, present only in spirit, she concedes her powers to those known as Vessels. These unique beings have the responsibility to wield Numa's Light to better the world.
Jessabel is the guardian of the next Vessel, Allegra. Responsible for educating her, training her and in this particular case, raising her, she will soon find out that there is more to Allegra than she could have ever imagined.
This one Vessel has the power to change everything. It's Jessabel's duty to make sure Allegra does well. For the sake of humankind.

FEATURES


  • A heart touching story that connects deeply with the human experience as a whole
  • Compelling characters each with their own impact on the world they live in
  • A true sense of adventure. Travelling through woods, mountains, ships, caves and ruins, this is a classical RPG experience
  • Quest Journal
  • Mouse Support
